block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: This origami Swan by Robert J. Lang is simple beautiful. I almost fell in love with it at first sight. I do encourage you to try folding this Origami Swan. I would say the difficulty of this piece is medium. Give it a try! Enjoy!!! Thanks For Watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art

block_list.title: More Designs from Robert J. Lang
block_list.body:
• Foldable Knife by Robert J. Lang
  • Swan by Robert J. Lang
